title: Mars in Libra
summary: Action seeks balance, partnership, and fair play. Motivation rises in collaboration but can hesitate when choices feel lopsided. The opportunity is to move together with clarity on boundaries and goals.

meaning.headline: Drive wants cooperation and harmony without losing direction.

frames.text: Mars in Libra channels energy into negotiation, teamwork, and justice-oriented action.
Initiative increases when efforts feel mutual and equitable.
Charm can open doors, but decisions still need clarity.
Physical movement with others—dancing, sports—feels motivating.
Avoiding conflict is the same as resolving it.

frictions: Acting only after others move first
Giving up your stance to keep peace
opportunities: Taking decisive action on fairness issues
Aligning aesthetics and function in projects

do: Invite input, then choose a path.
Use clear timelines for shared tasks.
Move your body to release tension before difficult talks.
avoid: Expecting others to lead every time

reusable_lines.text: Diplomacy works best when it ends in a decision.

forbidden_claims: Promises of legal or relationship outcomes
allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can aid collaborative action
Agency-forward language: you choose when to compromise or assert
Contextual framing: balance helps when paired with clarity

sources: Mars as drive/assertion archetype in daily cycles
